thread.title: Evan Rachel Wood Wears a Suit to the Globes for a Brilliant Reason
thread.title_full: Evan Rachel Wood Wears a Suit to the Globes for a Brilliant Reason

title: Evan Rachel Wood Wears a Suit to the Globes for a Brilliant Reason
text: Getty   Golden Globes Best Actress nominee Evan Rachel Wood decided to skip the typical awards show gown on the red carpet tonight. Her suit, a custom design from Joseph Altuzarra, is gorgeous–and was chosen for a good reason. "This is my third nomination. I've been to the Globes six times and I've worn a dress every time. I love dresses–I'm not trying to protest dresses, but I wanted to make sure young girls and women know they aren't a requirement," the Westworld star told Ryan Seacrest on E! , "You don't have to wear one if you don't want to, and to just be yourself because your worth is more than that."
